title: Sticky chilli and thyme pork stir-fry
description: This healthy pork stir-fry works great as a quick and easy midweek supper.

method.Step 1: Heat the oil in a wok or frying pan over a medium-high heat and fry the garlic, chilli and ginger for a few minutes until fragrant.

method.Step 2: Add the pork and stir-fry over a high heat for 4-5 minutes until just cooked. Add the chilli sauce and thyme and cook for another minute. Remove from the wok and set aside.

method.Step 3: Add the pepper, pak choi and a little water to the wok, and cook for 2-3 minutes. Return the pork with the spring onion, and toss for few minutes. Serve with steamed rice.
